betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Getting an §2Solid Fuel Steam Boiler§f will bring you torwards §eAge 0 - The Steam Age§f!

Simply just put §2Water§f into the §2Boiler§f and then put an burnable fuel in like §2Coal§f§f and wait for it to build up heat by watching the red bar going up, then it will begin to produce §2Steam§f! It won't output §2Steam§f to the bottom, it's the best to use that side to input §2Water§f from that side (It was specifically implemented for this).

§fNOTE: Never put §2Water§f into the §2Boiler§f while it's hot and empty, else it will explode!
